text:
e="preserve">Ocean Spray is an American agricultural cooperative. It is headquartered in Plymouth County, Massachusetts. It has over 700 growers of grapefruit and cranberries in Florida, Wisconsin, Massachusetts, Oregon and Washington.
The products by Ocean Spray include dried cranberries, fruit juices and fruit snacks.
Ocean Spray's cranberry juice won the ChefsBestAward for Best Taste. It also made dried raisins (Craisins).
